channel.title: WizardCM
channel.description: Hey hey, I'm Matt. I'm a front end web developer specialising in React (though this site's written in Vue). In my spare time I contribute to @OBSProject

item.title: I consider myself more a consumer than a creator
item.description: The title of this post is a sentence that has crossed my mind and my lips a few times in the past couple of years. Until this week, I didnâ€™t understand how accurate I was.
